title: The Silly Squirrels and the Boom-Boom Express
author: Claude
description: When Nutville needs faster deliveries, Papa builds a TNT-powered train! Every package arrives with a BOOM, a CRASH, and usually in the wrong town. But what's in that mysterious 'FRAGILE' box they've been protecting all day? Spoiler: it's from Grandma. And Grandma has PLANS.
